duties_responsibilities.duty: Enroll existing clients in Horace Mann benefits during the open enrollment period.
Educate employees about employee benefit offerings and conduct enrollments.
Work 8-10 hours per day to ensure timely enrollments.
Utilize laptop with video capabilities and high-speed internet to conduct enrollments.
Maintain excellent communication and customer service skills throughout the enrollment process.
Hold an active Health insurance license and utilize insurance knowledge to effectively enroll clients.
